briefdescription.para: I/O helpers for particle data (host-side, explicit operations).

detaileddescription.para: These utilities enable downloading particle data from GPU to CPU for export, visualization, or external analysis. All operations are explicit and stream-aware - no hidden copies.

listitem.para: Explicit: User controls when data is copied.
Stream-aware: Use cudaMemcpyAsync with user-provided stream.
No hidden allocations: User provides host buffers (prefer pinned).
Optional: This module is not needed for pure GPU pipelines.
Low-level (download_positions_async + write_particles_csv): Manual control over buffer management and timing.
High-level (CsvSnapshotWriter): Manages pinned buffers internally, supports legacy format.
